column5: And a great big thanks to you for being you Dawg !!!
nice pics, thanks for sharing.

Truely awesome report G.  Brings a tear to my eye  Great pics too, glad you found them.  Were they behind the shed with the moonshine  It really was a great gathering this year and I already can't wait for next year.  Joey

Wow,the Lakair reports are coming out of the woodwork now... Glen...love the pics dawg !!!! You just keep those GPS settings to yourself now yahere.....heh heh heh,I still got me one honey of a hole that I haven't taken ya into bubba.....I'm savin that one fer next years derby Lookin forward to sharin the boat with ya next year !!!!!   Cheers !!!!
Dang dawg got a little mushy there  Good report, that monster perch attacked one of my favorite crank baits  Glad you had a great time, I'll try not to miss next year.  Whopper
ditto....

Glen,you are truely,one of a kind  We just left LaKair..and already I want to go back,not enough time to talk to everyone.The Motley crew was a good one,must of been early on into the night  Chris,what you got a better spot for Dawg next year,he caught fish that..he even had his shirt on.  Steve
Great meeting up with you Glen and having a few chats, really enjoyed that.  Maybe we can hook up next year for a little time on the water.  (I'll bring my GPS too   )

Hey Glen, glad you didn't lose the camera, it would have  been a real shame to have lost those pictures. ( I stole a few  )  And Dawg, it's me who should be thanking you for letting me in your boat and taking me fishing...it was very much appreciated...good to see you again and I am already making plans for next year.  I hope to have my own boat for that week and I'd be honoured to take you out for a few Pickeral  Maureen
Excellent report and pic's Dawg.... Good to have seen you again this year....  I can't wait for next year, already, either....  Thanks for sharing
Dawg you are always welcome under our roof wether it is in Canada or here in Virginia. Nice report and thanks for another year of fun and friendship.   Art
Great report from a great coonass !! Did the grub end up catching y'all anything ? Next year we're getting out fishing together, I've got a great "worlds greatest sportfish" spot. lol
Hey Graham is that the same spot I was catching the worlds greatest game fish while you guys were catching all the pickerals last year.  Whopper

Is was that close Steve...He kept on saying stuff like "its getting so hot out here its going to turn into a nudity day".....oh god no please don't start taking yer close off !!!! I made darn shure the bailing bucket was near by......  Cheers !!!
Dawg,yer an OK redneck in my book.Thanx for all the beer and that special edition Rapala.I'm sure we'll see you before next years GTG. Joe
Real nice meeting you again Dawg......Glad you managed to save the photos.
Great job Glen. All those pics and lucky for us it was cold enough for you to keep your shirt on the whole week. Only kidding, Thanks for the report.

Thanks for the post, Glen.  That has got to be one of my most favouritest things, getting together with the OFC gang at Lakair.  The most fun you can have while laughing.   As for the most fun you can have without laughing,  that requires the RLG.
Good to finally meet you Dawg, she aint my wife and yes that is indeed a motley crue.

Hey Glenny, it seems like over a week since I saw you.  Finally got the computer problem fixed now it's time to try to catch up on all the Lakair posts.  Great seeing you again.  Nice pics and glad to see your northern skills are starting to match your southern ones.
Great pics GCD and you had the most thank you's.Looks like a great time .I have to go next year.  MTP

Glen...meeting you was one of the highlights for bly and I.  You are every bit as strange and weird in real life as you are here on the board.    All kidding aside, it was a real pleasure chatting with you.  Congrats on a great trip...that walleye you boated was sure was a nice one!!  Hope to see you again up there next year!
